Thank you for this looks very helpful if only I can get it to work, I keep getting this error:NHibernate.HibernateException: The IDbCommand and IDbConnection implementation in the assembly Community.CsharpSqlite.SQLiteClient could not be found. Ensure that the assembly Community.CsharpSqlite.SQLiteClient is located in the application directoryAnd I do have that assembly in the test directory.Any ideeas ?

For anyone else who comes across this issue - the projects are set to target the x86 platform by default. If you are running on a 64-bit platform this can be an issue. Simple enough to change the build target to Any CPU.
